snippet.title: Galactic Civilizations III - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The largest strategy sandbox ever awaits in Galactic Civilizations III from Stardock. How will you rule your galaxy?

10% off when you buy direct from Stardock: 
https://www.galciv3.com/store 

Also available on Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/226860 


Developed and published by Stardock: http://www.stardock.com/

***
Find us on http://Twitch.tv/stardock
Streaming live all your favorite games and more!

Subscribe to this channel: http://bit.ly/Subscribe_to_StardockGames
Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_Facebook
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_Twitter
Follow us on G+: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_GooglePlus
Follow us on Linkedin: http://bit.ly/Stardock_on_Linkedin
